definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Shaving leg hair and armpit hair gel when used to, because it does not make you feel dry.
sentences.chinese: 刮腿毛及腋毛時可用去毛膠，因它不會讓你感到乾澀。

sentences.english: A little dry and traditional, but lots of good information.
sentences.chinese: 內容有些乾澀和傳統，但還是有很多有用的信息。

sentences.english: They may also have dry eyes, head pain and bowel problems.
sentences.chinese: 他們也可能有眼睛乾澀，頭脹痛，排便困難。

sentences.english: They taste similar to a combination of cherries and raisins, but are more bitter and slightly drier.
sentences.chinese: 嚐起來口感像櫻桃和葡萄乾的混合，但更苦，更乾澀。

sentences.english: I get tough, quail get dry.
sentences.chinese: 我會變強硬，鵪鶉會變乾澀。

sentences.english: Bertha tried to speak, but her throat was dry, and she could utter no word.
sentences.chinese: 伯莎企圖講話，但她的喉嚨乾澀，她發不出聲音。

sentences.english: No snow in winter, lonely, dryness, such as dark and yellow skin, dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 無雪的冬，寂寞，乾澀，如暗黃的肌膚，缺水而粗糙。

sentences.english: Bitterness has a drying, astringent feeling, like the sensation you get after drinking very strong tea.
sentences.chinese: 苦味具有一個乾澀的感覺，如同喝濃茶之後的感覺。

definition: wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
